#summary Detail on addItemAuction()

== Introduction ==

Call this function to add a new auction item on Delcampe website.


== Details ==

 * syntax : addItemAuction(string $token, $arrData)

 * parameter 1 : _string_ : secret token
 * parameter 2 : _array_  : containing all the mandatory data to create an auction item

 * return : _array_ : first element is the status (boolean) and second one is additional data
